Summary: I saw twice a very small object intimidate a small plane.
divs: sighting detailswhen i was walking down my street sidewalk i saw in the south a very small dotted object (1\16" in diameter)intimidate a small aircraft (privately owned airplane). i saw the object traveling at the exact speed as the plane at 11 o'clock (position) then go to its cockpit then back and forth to its back wings. then a big pine tree got in way of my view. two or three weeks later i saw it again in the same place at 11 o'clock, and doing the same as above. only this time i saw it from my living room window. six months later, i was walking down my street sidewalk, and i looked to my right. it was about 75 yards from me, and traveling at the exact speed i was walking. about twenty seconds later it flung out towards me, and disappeared into outer space at a high speed. i was not wearing glasses, as that might have created light reflection. the object was about 75 yards from me in all three cases. thank you.
